title: Base Voice Event
description: Base schema for all voice-related events across the Hey-Ma ecosystem. Provides common fields for transcription, audio metadata, and session tracking. All voice component events extend this base.

event_type.description: Event discriminator for routing (e.g., 'whisperlivekit.transcription.completed'). Used by Bloodbank for topic-based routing.

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 UTC timestamp when event was emitted

session_id.description: UUID of the voice session this event relates to. Used for event correlation and tracing across the voice-to-response pipeline.

target.description: Intended consumer of this event (e.g., 'tonny', 'candybar'). Used for targeted routing.
